page.title: 20West Park Farm
page.content: West park farm, with land in the {ancient Lytchett Matravers deerpark, is a dairy and arable farm. There was a farmhouse there in 1765, according to{Issac Taylor's map}of the area. This could be the house and old farm buildings which are still there. The farm and buildings are in reasonable repair and situated in the very pleasant valley looking across to Lytchett Matravers church. The farm is due to be{sold}in late 1985 or early 1986. It is one of the last farms of the old Trenchard Estate to be sold.
